name: ActionLinks
description: Create, delete, and get information about an action link group definition; get information about an action link group; get action link diagnostic information.

createactionlinkgroupdefinition(string,c.name: createActionLinkGroupDefinition
createactionlinkgroupdefinition(string,c.signature: public static ConnectApi.ActionLinkGroupDefinition createActionLinkGroupDefinition(String communityId, ConnectApi.ActionLinkGroupDefinitionInput actionLinkGroup)
createactionlinkgroupdefinition(string,c.overrideSignature: public static override ConnectApi.ActionLinkGroupDefinition createActionLinkGroupDefinition(String communityId, ConnectApi.ActionLinkGroupDefinitionInput actionLinkGroup)
createactionlinkgroupdefinition(string,c.description: Create an action link group definition. To associate an action link group with a feed element, first create an action link group definition. Then post a feed element with an associated actions capability.

actionlinkgroup.name: actionLinkGroup
actionlinkgroup.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. A ConnectApi.ActionLinkGroupDefinitionInput object that defines the action link group.

deleteactionlinkgroupdefinition(string,s.name: deleteActionLinkGroupDefinition
deleteactionlinkgroupdefinition(string,s.signature: public static void deleteActionLinkGroupDefinition(String communityId, String actionLinkGroupId)
deleteactionlinkgroupdefinition(string,s.overrideSignature: public static override void deleteActionLinkGroupDefinition(String communityId, String actionLinkGroupId)
deleteactionlinkgroupdefinition(string,s.description: Delete an action link group definition. Deleting an action link group definition removes all references to it from feed elements.

actionlinkgroupid.name: actionLinkGroupId
actionlinkgroupid.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID of the action link group.

getactionlink(string,string).name: getActionLink
getactionlink(string,string).signature: public static ConnectApi.PlatformAction getActionLink(String communityId, String actionLinkId)
getactionlink(string,string).overrideSignature: public static override ConnectApi.PlatformAction getActionLink(String communityId, String actionLinkId)
getactionlink(string,string).description: Get information about an action link, including state for the context user.

actionlinkid.name: actionLinkId
actionlinkid.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID of the action link.

getactionlinkdiagnosticinfo(string,strin.name: getActionLinkDiagnosticInfo
getactionlinkdiagnosticinfo(string,strin.signature: public static ConnectApi.ActionLinkDiagnosticInfo getActionLinkDiagnosticInfo(String communityId, String actionLinkId)
getactionlinkdiagnosticinfo(string,strin.overrideSignature: public static override ConnectApi.ActionLinkDiagnosticInfo getActionLinkDiagnosticInfo(String communityId, String actionLinkId)
getactionlinkdiagnosticinfo(string,strin.description: Get diagnostic information returned when an action link executes. Diagnostic information is given only for users who can access the action link.

actionlinkid.name: actionLinkId
actionlinkid.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID of the action link.

getactionlinkgroup(string,string).name: getActionLinkGroup
getactionlinkgroup(string,string).signature: public static ConnectApi.PlatformActionGroup getActionLinkGroup(String communityId, String actionLinkGroupId)
getactionlinkgroup(string,string).overrideSignature: public static override ConnectApi.PlatformActionGroup getActionLinkGroup(String communityId, String actionLinkGroupId)
getactionlinkgroup(string,string).description: Get information about an action link group including state for the context user.

actionlinkgroupid.name: actionLinkGroupId
actionlinkgroupid.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID of the action link group.

getactionlinkgroupdefinition(string,stri.name: getActionLinkGroupDefinition
getactionlinkgroupdefinition(string,stri.signature: public static ConnectApi.ActionLinkGroupDefinition getActionLinkGroupDefinition(String communityId, String actionLinkGroupId)
getactionlinkgroupdefinition(string,stri.overrideSignature: public static override ConnectApi.ActionLinkGroupDefinition getActionLinkGroupDefinition(String communityId, String actionLinkGroupId)
getactionlinkgroupdefinition(string,stri.description: Get information about an action link group definition.

actionlinkgroupid.name: actionLinkGroupId
actionlinkgroupid.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID of the action link group.
